tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_preference VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE investment_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20),
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    investment_time_horizon INT,
    investment_goals TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPreferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20),
  investment_horizon INT,
  preferred_asset_class VARCHAR(50),
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE RecommendedInvestments (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  recommended_asset VARCHAR(50),
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserProfiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR,
    last_name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE investment_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR,
    time_horizon INT,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_preferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_tolerance VARCHAR(20),
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_industry VARCHAR(50),
    geographic_region VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommended_investments (
    recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    recommended_amount DECIMAL,
    rationale TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_history (
    user_id UUID,
    investment_date DATE,
    investment_id UUID,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id)
);
